link.title: Frontier Public Schools - Senior Students

body.script: YAHOO.util.Event.addListener(document, "keyup", function (e) { if (!e) { e = event; } if (e.keyCode == 27) { document.location.href = "/employee-login/?returnUrl=%2Fsenior-students%2F%3FSSScrollPosition%3D0"; } });

p.span: Seniors: Make sure and Check your Senior 2020 Classroom Page page at least Weekly for Updates.
Feel free to invite your parents to see the information. This is where Scholarships and Updated Information pertaining to seniors will be posted.
SENIOR Class Meetings and Information will be sent by REMIND from Mrs. Scherman/ Mrs. Valerius.
Parents, Please Feel Free to Join By (Text: @f66b44 to 81010)
Info to be included but not limited to

li.a: Tribal Scholarships contact Mrs. Black (Click Here For Senior Tribal Student Info)

li.span: contact Mrs. Valerius or Mrs. Womack
Look for Senior Spotlight information and directions on Google Classroom!
